About the Evalutation Version

In order to properly run Qt Jambi Applications the binaries have to patched with the evaluation key. For windows this is done by the installer. For Mac OS X and Linux this is done by the various scripts, like qtjambi.sh. It can also be done explicitly by running the binpatch application supplied in the qtjambi package.

A general Qt Jambi readme is available in the installation directory: readme.html.
